column4: Hey, my laptop is running abnormally hot, and the fan is on constantly. Is there a way to cool things down?
check what is eating CPU w/ top
Nothing. pidgin is the most resource intensive thing running, and it's only taking 2%
what is the cpu on the lappy
Also, the display has started randomly flashing white every few minutes. I'm afraid the video card might be overheating or something. I'm using the fglrx drivers.
FATAL: Error inserting speedstep_ich (/lib/modules/2.6.20-15-generic/kernel/arch/i386/kernel/cpu/cpufreq/speedstep-ich.ko): No such device
sorry, can't help more but basically looks like speedstep is not functional.
So I need to find out how to enable it?
ya, try googling speedstep with you laptop model no etc.
